numbered_ace_sentences: 4. Some parents have a high income.
5. Legacy applicants with parents who have a high income are more likely to be admitted.
6. Some non-legacy applicants are in the 10th income percentile.
7. Some non-legacy applicants are in the 90th income percentile.
8. The 10th income percentile of non-legacy applicants has a higher chance of admission than the 90th income percentile of non-legacy applicants.
9. The 90th income percentile is richer than the 10th income percentile.
10. I wonder why this difference exists.
11. I wonder what this difference says about admissions.
